name: Boom Stick (itch)
description:
Hello and welcome to Boom Stick! Traverse the platforms collecting point tokens and avoiding the enemies. Try and finish the level and beat your high score! 

We are a small Indie game development firm that built this game in a few days. It is our first attempt at a Platformer, and we had so much fun building the game, we will continue to add content over the coming weeks and months.

There are a few bugs in this version that we will work out, but we wanted to get the core game out so we can get some feedback. Please be kind, we are new at this 😉. Thank you for playing!
